dmca.title: Sony TV/ bigdealtv.com 3032
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jayme Williams [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, June 28, 2006 8:59 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Sony TV/ bigdealtv.com 3032
Subject: RE: Sony TV/ bigdealtv.com 3032



 

To Whom It May Concern:

Thank you for removing all of Sony TV logos and copyrighted images from
the urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the copyrighted
images and/or trademarked logos of Sony TV needs to be removed from your
entire website. This case will remain open until this request is
satisfied in full.  If you should need any further assistance in
reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my best to provide
you with the needed information.  Below are the remaining URLs that are
in violation. Once the images/text and trademarked logos have been
removed from these links please let me know by sending an email to
jayme@netenforcers.com. Upon receiving this email I will have your
website rechecked and close this case. 

Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter, 

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1476

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1630

LMS Associate

Net Enforcers, Inc.

jayme@netenforcers.com <mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com> 

compliance.management@netenforcers.com
<mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com> 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

-----Original Message-----

From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]


Sent: Friday, June 02, 2006 12:32 PM

To: Jayme Williams; Compliance Management; copyright@theplanet.com

Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony bigdealtv.com 3032

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

 

 

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

 

 

 

Legal Response Team

 

The Planet

 

 

 

 

---------

 

 

From: Jayme [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 

 

Posted At: Tuesday, May 16, 2006 1:43 PM

 

Posted To: Copyright

 

Conversation: bigdealtv.com-SONY TV-EV Letterhead ISP Letter Template

 

Subject: bigdealtv.com-SONY TV-EV Letterhead ISP Letter Template

 

 

 

 

 

DMCA Notification/Sony TV/bigdealtv.com 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------

 

 

 

Phoenix Office:

 

 

 

Ellis & Venable

 

101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875

 

 

 

Phoenix, Arizona 85003 voice: (602) 631-9393

 

 

 

fax: (602) 631-9796

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

May 16, 2006

 

  

 

 

 

7006 0100 0002 0710 3032 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

 

 

 

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

George Poletes

 

 

 

1333 N Stemmons Fwy

 

 

 

Ste 110

 

 

 

Dallas TX 75207

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Re:      Unauthorized Use of SONY TELEVISIONS Trademarks and/or
Copyrighted Materials

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have been retained by our Sony Television, Net Enforcers, Inc., to
contact you with respect to unauthorized use of Sonys trademarks and/or
copyrighted materials.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SONY TELEVISION has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection
and enforcement of its rights in SONY TELEVISION-owned or licensed
trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.  Net Enforcers has
in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. '
512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. ' 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify
you of SONY TELEVISIONs good faith belief that your Sony Television,
Bigdealtv.com at the URL www.bigdealtv.com is using SONY TELEVISION
trademarks and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by SONY
TELEVISION, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to Sony
Television products sold by SONY TELEVISIONs Division.  SONY TELEVISION
has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to
act on behalf of SONY TELEVISION.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

            The specific works, graphics or other material SONY
TELEVISION believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing
activity (the Infringing Material) are copyrighted images from SONY
TELEVISIONs website.  Specific violations of copyrighted images by
Bigdealtv.com are listed below this paragraph.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1590

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1595

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1387

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1479

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://bigdealtv.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1386

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

            Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. '
512(c)(1)(C), SONY TELEVISION hereby demands that you remove or disable
access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance
Management Department via facsimile to 501-646-6242, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communications should be in
writing.  However, if you wish to speak with Net Enforcers directly, you
may contact them at 501-646-6242.  SONY TELEVISION has authorized Net
Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you.  Please do not
contact SONY TELEVISION directly, as SONY TELEVISION will simply refer
the matter back to Net Enforcers.  If your designated agent or
representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m.
on May 26, 2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and
proceed accordingly.

 

 

 

Sincerely,

 

 

 

Ellis & Venable

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lance C. Venable

 

 

 

Attorney at Law

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

LCV/roc
